ygData.subject: How to verify the Mino Horn is not a brass WAS:(RE: Brass or Wind?)
ygData.msgSnippet: When you next go up a level immediatly go to a safe area and practice your brass song using your Mino Horn.  Carefully watch the screen messages. Eventually
ygData.messageBody:
When you next go up a level immediatly go to a safe area and practice your
brass song using your Mino Horn. Carefully watch the screen messages.
Eventually you will see a skill increase message showing that Singing, not
Brass, has increased.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server

>From: "Renee Cole" <nat_ive@...>
>
>Is there any way we can get some confirmation about the minotaur horn's
>usage? I have heard from some that it is only Wind, and now we have
>someone
>who claims it also works for Brass...can anyone confirm this?
>
>
>I also have a question on this: can you use the mino horn to raise the
>brass skill? Currently my brass is maxed for my level, but I've been
>lugging around a brass instrument just for this purpose, would be nice if I
>could sell it back to the vendor.
>
>I did try the song with the mino horn, and it does work. But I'm not sure
>if its because I'm singing it while just holding the horn, or if I'm
>actually using the horn.
